food.question: I am long and yellow, monkeys love to peel me and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys love me!
💛 I am the color of sunshine.
🍦 Sometimes I am in a split with ice cream.

food.question: I am round and red, and I keep the doctor away. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I grow on trees.
✨ You can make juice with me.
🐛 A worm might like to live in me.

food.question: I am white, cold, and yummy. You eat me with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I am kept in the freezer.
🍦 I come in lots of flavors.
🍫 You can put chocolate sauce on me.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny eats me.
🌱 I grow underground.
👀 They say I am good for your eyes!

food.question: I am small, round, and green or purple. I grow in bunches on a vine. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 You can squish me easily.
🍷 Adults use me to make wine.
🥪 I am sometimes in your lunchbox.

food.question: I am made from milk, but I am hard. You can slice me and put me on a sandwich. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 Cows help make me.
🐭 Mice love me!
🍕 I taste great on pizza!

food.question: I am a drink that is white. Baby animals drink me from their mother. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 Cows give lots of me.
🥛 You can drink me with cookies.
💪 I am good for your bones.

food.question: I am a grain that is cooked in water. You can eat me with butter or soy sauce. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 You can eat me with chopsticks.
🇯🇵 I'm a staple in many Asian countries.
🥣 You can eat me plain, or with lots of toppings.

food.question: I am made of flour, water, and yeast, and baked in an oven. You can make sandwiches with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 You can toast me.
🥪 People love to put peanut butter and jelly on me.
🔥 I need to be baked to be edible

food.question: I grow in a shell, come in different colors, and are laid by a hen. Scrambled, fried, or boiled, you'll eat me then. What am I?

hints.text: 🥚 I sometimes come in green!
🍳 I am a popular breakfast food.
🐔 I come from a chicken.

weather.question: I fall from the sky and make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I often come from clouds
☔ You need an umbrella when I'm around
🌧️ Plants like me!

weather.question: I am big and yellow and shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I give you warmth
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm very bright
🌻 Flowers turn to face me

weather.question: I'm white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 Sometimes I look like sheep
✈️ Airplanes fly through me
🌫️ I can block the sun

weather.question: I am cold and white and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: 🧤 You need gloves when I fall
❄️ I'm made of tiny ice crystals
☃️ You can build a snowman with me

weather.question: I make the leaves swirl around and the trees dance. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be gentle or strong
🪁 You can fly a kite with me
💨 I'm air moving quickly

weather.question: I am very hot and bright, but only come out for a short time after the rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors
✨ I look like a colorful arch
💧 I need water and sunshine to appear

weather.question: I am frozen rain that falls from the sky. Sometimes I hurt when I hit you! What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I'm like tiny ice balls
💥 I make a loud noise when I land on the roof
⛈️ I often come with thunderstorms

weather.question: I am very loud and bright. I come with thunder. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I can be dangerous
🌩️ I flash in the sky
🔊 You hear a boom after you see me

weather.question: I am a big storm with strong winds that spin around and around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I can cause a lot of damage
🏠 People sometimes have to leave their homes when I am coming
🌊 I usually form over warm ocean water

weather.question: I'm a type of weather where it's very, very cold and there's a lot of snow and strong winds. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 You need lots of warm clothes!
❄️ It can be hard to see!
🌨️ Roads can be closed because of me
